TurnTime.description: How long this turtle should take to turn corners?

SpeedSwim.description: How fast this turtle should swim at.

DoReverse.description: Should this turtle follow the path backwards?

DoLoop.description: Should this turtle loop around the path?

WaitFruit.description: Should this turtle wait to be activated by a fruit object.

WaitRide.description: Should this turtle wait for a player before beginning to follow the path.

PathName.description: The path this turtle should follow.
